jdbcService.sql: insert into ~node_attachments ( id, created, modified, parent_id, type, sub_type, size, width, height, name, title, description, uri, external, language_id, attachment_group_id, meta, owner_id, priority, node_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :parentId, :type, :subType, :size, :width, :height, :name, :title, :description, :uri, :external, :languageId, :attachmentGroupId, :meta, :ownerId, :priority, :nodeId )
